document_data.mainbody:
The Brazen Buck was an inn and tavern on the Arnrock in the Lake of Steam as of the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
It was located within Sleeping Hollow, the islands closest approximation of a town.
The Brazen Buck was both the only inn and the only tavern on the island, and its proprietor, Belathra Kyndle was the only non-halfling on the island. Her inn was the only place in which other non-halflings could find lodgings and drink.
Along with the rest of the settlements on the island, the inn was lost after the Arnrock erupted in the .
